title: Stay a Little Longer, Save More
description:
Make a good thing last longer. Stay at least 3-nights at our newly reimagined Tribeca property, in downtown Manhattan, and enjoy up to 25% off.

  • Stay 3+ nights and save up to 15% Off

  • Stay 5+ nights and save up to 20% Off

  • Stay 7+ nights and save up to 25% Off

Enjoy our signature amenities:

 

  • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel

  • Frette linens

  • In-room safes

  • Alarm clock

  • Concierge services

  • Valet parking

  • Valet laundry

  • 24-hour fitness room

  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities

  • Pay per view

  • HD Channels

  • Complimentary New York Times newspapers

  • Serafina, Starbucks and Pret A Manger on premises
addon: Book this package and youâ€™ll also receive a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200.
